November  2015.  This  Court  has  examined  the  petition  filed 
in  that  application
marked ‘P13a’ and observes that the Petitioner had sought:

(
a)  
A Writ of Certiorari to quash the decision of the Minister to appoint a Board of
Inquiry to inquire into and report on the said Trust;

(
b)  
A Writ of Certiorari quashing the appointment of the 5th respondent (who is the
11th Respondent to this application) as a member of the Board of Inquiry;

(
c)  
A Writ of Certiorari quashing the proceedings of the inquiry conducted by the

(
d)  
A  Writ  of  Certiorari  quashing  the  decision  to  summon  the  Petitioner  for  the
